snippet: The ethics committee led by Hans-Joachim Eckert of FIFA cited legal reasons for not releasing all of an inquiry into the awarding of two World Cup sites.
abstract: FIFA ethics committee headed by Hans-Joachim Eckert will not release complete results of inquiry into controversial bidding process for the 2018 and 2022 World Cups, citing legal reasons.
lead_paragraph: The ethics committee led by Hans-Joachim Eckert of FIFA cited legal reasons for not releasing all of an inquiry into the awarding of two World Cup sites.

headline.main: Soccer Corruption Report Won’t Be Published in Full
headline.print_headline: FIFA Corruption Report Won’t Be Published in Full
